1.title: Divisions in the Church
1.keyEvent: Paul addresses factionalism among Corinthian believers

2.title: Wisdom from the Spirit
2.keyEvent: Paul teaches spiritual wisdom contrasted with worldly wisdom

3.title: Foundation of Christ
3.keyEvent: Paul explains the church as God's building on Christ

4.title: Paul’s Apostolic Ministry
4.keyEvent: Paul defends his role and calls for humility

5.title: Discipline for Immorality
5.keyEvent: Paul instructs the church to expel a sinful member

6.title: Lawsuits and Purity
6.keyEvent: Paul admonishes believers about lawsuits and sexual immorality

7.title: Marriage Instructions
7.keyEvent: Paul gives guidance on marriage, singleness, and divorce

8.title: Food Offered to Idols
8.keyEvent: Paul discusses conscience regarding eating idol food

9.title: Paul’s Rights as an Apostle
9.keyEvent: Paul defends his apostleship and rights for ministry

10.title: Warnings from Israel’s History
10.keyEvent: Paul warns against idolatry and temptation using Israel’s example

11.title: Worship and the Lord’s Supper
11.keyEvent: Instructions on head coverings and proper communion observance

12.title: Spiritual Gifts
12.keyEvent: Paul teaches about the diversity and unity of spiritual gifts

13.title: The Way of Love
13.keyEvent: Paul describes love as the greatest spiritual gift

14.title: Orderly Worship
14.keyEvent: Guidelines for prophecy and speaking in tongues in church

15.title: Resurrection of the Dead
15.keyEvent: Paul affirms Christ’s resurrection and the future resurrection of believers

16.title: Final Instructions
16.keyEvent: Paul gives concluding exhortations and travel plans
